messages.content: Stewart says: I hope that you will be able to join us, stand up for Scotland, and say no to a damaging 'no-deal' Brexit.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposes 'no-deal' Brexit and has been active in International Trade, advocating for the protection of jobs and investment.

mentions.candidate: Stewart has now been elected to represent this constituency at four elections.

issues.brexitEurope: Stewart has spoken out against a 'no-deal' Brexit and has held the government accountable on advice committees and local people sessions.
issues.economy: We need to protect jobs and investment.

politicalExperience.role: Member of the UK Parliament's Intelligence and Security Committee
politicalExperience.achievements: Speaks for the SNP on the important subject of International Trade.

quotes.text: We need to protect jobs and investment. Now is not the time for a risky 'no-deal' Brexit.

images.caption: Stewart Hosie at International Trade Questions and Prime Minister's Questions.
